nodes.bodyText: Should this be done inside the PlayerComponent renderer?

Gotcha 👍
I moved the rendering to the PlayerComponent though it did introduce a viewer parameter. Also I opted to not add back the showSelf to NameStyle, as the bolding of names will only be done in the tab. Does not make sense to define it if other styles will not utilize it. Let me know if this was the right approach or if you have an alternative.
